alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 9:26PM CDT until April 23 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SEMINOLE...SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND NORTHEASTERN POTTAWATOMIE COUNTIES... At 926 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Boley to 4 miles southwest of Paden to near Johnson to near Shawnee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Prague, Meeker, Johnson, Centerview and Aydelotte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
